title: Legal Assistant
job_overview:
We are looking for a capable and proficient Legal Assistant to provide high-level administrative support to our legal department. The primary responsibilities of this role will include calendaring, proficiently handling email correspondence, and communicating with courts and other administrative tasks as required.

The ideal candidate must have:

Proven work experience as a legal admin or legal assistant.  
Possess strong organizational skills, consistently demonstrating accuracy and careful attention to detail when preparing documents and handling various administrative tasks.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.  
Upholding discretion and integrity in the management of sensitive and confidential information. 
Establishes and maintains effective professional relationships with colleagues and demonstrates proficiency in functioning efficiently within a dynamic, high-paced environment.
Stable internet connection.  
Functional camera and noise-canceling wired headset.

If you possess the qualifications outlined above and are excited about the opportunity to join our team, please apply using the form provided below.
 Upgrade to see actual info

Rest assured that all the information you provide will be handled confidentially and used solely for the purpose of assessing your candidacy for the position.

Once you have completed the form, our recruitment team will carefully review your application along with the submitted details. If you are selected to proceed further in the hiring process, we will reach out to you directly to schedule an interview.
